description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A classic match 3 block game in which up to 4 players compete to remove blocks from their playing field before it's filled. Drop blocks on your opponents by matching 4 or more blocks or forming chains of matches.
description.short: A classic match 3 block game in which up to 4 players compete to remove blocks from their playing field before it's filled. Drop blocks on your opponents by matching 4 or more blocks or forming chains of matches.
